name: Meals on Wheels San Mateo County (Peninsula Volunteers)
description: Peninsula Volunteers operates Meals on Wheels in San Mateo County, delivering nutritious meals to homebound adults 60+ while providing vital social connection and wellness checks.
fullDescription: Peninsula Volunteers operates Meals on Wheels in San Mateo County, delivering nutritious meals to homebound adults 60+ while providing vital social connection and wellness checks.
whatTheyOffer:
- Hot meal delivered Monday-Friday
- Frozen weekend meals available
- Suggested donation of $5.25/meal, but never denied
- Special diet accommodations
- Friendly safety check with each delivery
- Pet food available for clients with pets
howToGetIt: Call to apply. You must be 60+ and primarily homebound due to age, illness, or disability. A staff member will assess eligibility and schedule deliveries.
